text: See What I Say is a 1981 American short documentary film produced by Linda Chapman, Pam LeBlanc and Freddi Stevens. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. The subjects of the film are hearing-impaired women who discuss their use of sign language. ==See also== *List of films featuring the deaf and hard of hearing ==References== ==External links== * Category:1981 films Category:1981 documentary films Category:1981 short films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:American independent films Category:American Sign Language films Category:English- language films Category:Documentary films about deaf people Category:Documentary films about women Category:Short documentary films
title: See What I Say
